model.title: Single Model
model.description: Single AI model to test (e.g., 'moonshotai/kimi-linear-48b-a3b-instruct'). Note: If 'models' array is also provided, this field will be ignored and 'models' will take precedence.

models.title: Multiple Models (Optional)
models.description: Array of AI model names to test. Takes precedence over 'model' if provided. Use this to test multiple models in a single run.

maxPrompts.title: Maximum Prompts
maxPrompts.description: Maximum number of prompts to test (1-182)

categories.title: Prompt Categories
categories.description: Filter prompts by categories. Leave empty to test all categories.

retryAttempts.title: Retry Attempts
retryAttempts.description: Number of retry attempts on API failure

openrouterApiKey.title: OpenRouter API Key
openrouterApiKey.description: OpenRouter API key (optional, can also use OPENROUTER_API_KEY environment variable)

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key (optional, can also use OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable)

anthropicApiKey.title: Anthropic API Key
anthropicApiKey.description: Anthropic API key (optional, can also use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable)

geminiApiKey.title: Gemini API Key
geminiApiKey.description: Google Gemini API key (optional, can also use GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable)
